question.q: What is the name of your team?

question.a: The big hairy creature in Star Wars is Chewbacca

question.q: Who wrote the three laws of robotics?
question.a: The three laws of robotics were written by Isaac Asimov

question.q: From what series do you know Rosie the robot?
question.a: I know Rosie the robot from The Jetsons

question.a: I know Bam Bam the baby from The Flintstones

question.a: The main character of The Matrix is Neo
